website_summaries.verdict: If you want to have several pre-set locations, you can buy extra receivers for this stand and move it quickly and quietly.
pros: Seat folds up quickly if you need to take a standing shot
Adjustable for trees that are not completely straight
cons: This model is not a climber

customer_reviews.title: Great stand. Awesome enough for someone to steal.
customer_reviews.text: Should be more like I loved it. It was easy to put together, as well as hanging it. I sit in it for maybe 5 mins and then got down. Went to hunt today and it was Stolen along with my Browning trail camera. Someone needed them more then me I guess. Once I get my money saved up. I will be buying another. But this time it will be mounted to tree and taken down every time I get down.
customer_reviews.author: michael myers

customer_reviews.title: Best Hang-On Stand Available
customer_reviews.text: I am sold on Millennium lock on stands. Their quality is superior to any other lock on or climber I've hunted out of. The M150 monster model has a massive platform to stand upon. My only issue with the product would be the synthetic strap that is used for the receiver. My previous Millennium used a chain receiver, I worry that a squirrel could possibly chew on the strap.
customer_reviews.author: MyAllegory

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Way easier to install than other tree stands I use Also heavier than others I use but I bought for my wife for the bigger platform and I can say the comfort is way better than my lone wolf Alpha tree stand. I can say I would use If you plan to setup and leave for season. As for packing it in and out everyday I hunt no due to size and weight
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious.
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable loc on I have ever used. Large platform that mounts and hangs very securely. I am a large guy and this is extremely comfortable for me. I have purchased a total of 7 of these in the last 2 years and will continue until I find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Gnhuntn

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, lightweight and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing negative or nothing to dislike about this stand. Comfortable, rugged and made to last. I’ve sold all the other stands and replaced them with Millennium stands. All day sits, half days it and hour - this stand will keep you comfy and not moving around to get comfortable. Easiest stand to to place in a tree as well. This company put time into the innovation of a top notch tree stand. Unless your sponsored by some other company who gives you stands for free, spend the money and buy Millennium tree stands. Seriously!
customer_reviews.author: George T.

customer_reviews.title: Best hang on made
customer_reviews.text: Well construsted with top quality materials. I've owned many other hang on stands b4 but this one is the bomb. Very comfortable chair also. I'm a happy hunter 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: robert l.

customer_reviews.title: The best is important.
customer_reviews.text: Guys, This is clearly the best hang-on I've ever used. I bought and hung three this year and they are my go to stands this season given how comfortable and safe these are. I'm certain these folks are triple welding all the key seams and since I like to install these 20 feet high in tree, I appreciate the confidence the construction of these yields me. I've also mirrored each of these with the millennium 210 step sticks and they work great as well. Safe hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Ed M.

customer_reviews.title: SSOOOO Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This tree stand is huge. But, light. It is extremely comfortable and can be put in a lot of different types of trees. I have owned several very expensive - top of the line stands before. They are very nice but no where near as comfortable as this one.
customer_reviews.author: birdman

customer_reviews.title: Very secure and strong.  Get it now!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, except the bracket nuts. Use a pair of pliers to get them started. Solid as a rock and very strong. No sway on the tree. Easy to sit all day. Quiet and comfortable. Absolutely recommend this. I use the millennium 20' steps and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. The life line that comes with this stand ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge and light considering size. Very comfortable. The life line that comes with this stand is high quality heavy rope. Factor that in when u compare price. I see them in store for $40. Very easy to put together and the level arm is awesome. There are YouTube reviews I recommend watching. Everything about this unit is well thought out and high quality. I bought 3 and plan on adding 5 more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY easy to secure to the tree
customer_reviews.text: Directions are a little confusing the first time, Didn't need to even look at them for the second stand. VERY easy to secure to the tree, VERY easy to hang it. Very sturdy, stable and secure feeling. Fold down chair is comfortable for a long sit. Wish I had bought more and WILL buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Ron Recos

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is unbelievable. Easiest to set up I have ever owned has an absolute perfect design everything I ever wanted in a stand and the comfort is pretty dang nice too. I would also like to mention dead silent mobility!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Best lock on you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Best lock on you can buy, I have 2. Very comfortable, easy to hang. you can sit all day and feel comfortable and safe. Large platform for standing and moving for that perfect bow shot. Only problem I had was with one of the ratchet straps. Millennium did not warranty the strap had to purchased a new one. Nothing to do with Amazon. Otherwise a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W.

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these for several years. I have used my son's a couple of times. All the Millennium stands we have are great. The M150 is by far the most comfortable to hunt out of for the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: sdjdmd58

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Treestand is awesome. Light and easy to hang and is very portable. Love all the adjustments on this treestand. Seat is one of the most comfortable I've ever been in and I've been in a lot thru out the years!! Cost was kinda high for a loc on but I got mine for a lot less thru discounts so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: HARD TIMES

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: awsome. easy to set, light but sturdy. comfortable. worth the money no question,.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Maybe Too Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super Comfy And Easy To Install Treestand. Mounting Bracket Takes The Struggle Of Hangin A Set Out Of The Equation. For Being A Monster It’s Very Light. They Need To Start Equipping These With Seat Belts. Ya Don’t Want To Wake Up Hangin Out The Stand From Your Lifeline!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Millennium builds the best tree-stands period. I am a believer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Stand from Millennium
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and Safe love the fact that I can move it, I bought two ladders and an extra cam lock mount so I can use it at two locations
customer_reviews.author: Seabee

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, hasslefree, comfy and lightweight’
customer_reviews.text: Fairly simple to put up, light weight for its size, no squeaks, and comfortable to sit it. Only downside if shooting close range while sitting, the seat gets in the way but worth the trade off for the comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Plus the biggest most comfortable, extremely easy to hang stand there is
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand. Saftey harness, saftey line. That's 50-80 dollars. Plus the biggest most comfortable, extremely easy to hang stand there is. Plenty of real estate sitting down and standing. Worth every penny! I bought the shooting rail too. Not all that solid, but it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as u can be 20 feet up
customer_reviews.text: Finally had to give this stand a try. Wow it's as awesome as u hear. So comfortable. True test will be this fall sitting 20 feet up for hours. If u are thinking about purchasing this stand just do it . U will love it.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Big and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome treestand. It’s big enough that you feel comfortable in it. I also have a 100 and there’s not much room to stand when the seat is down. Quality is awesome! I like the chain set up rather than the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang, sturdy and roomy, extremely comfortable. This is the best stand that I have owned. I like the way fact that you can adjust the platform to make it level for trees that are not exactly straight
customer_reviews.author: Michael Woolman

customer_reviews.title: Great stand, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, adjustable to your liking, large platform and light weight to carry in. Very happy with this purchase and likely will buy another when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Yaga

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: The seat is very comfortable. The platform and footrest are both large and comfortable. Light weight and easily transported and set up!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: and is as comfortable as my gunslinger climber
customer_reviews.text: Several guys that I hunt with have said they wouldn't sit in anything else. ..it's definitely the easiest lock on that I have ever hung in a tree. Very solid construction, and is as comfortable as my gunslinger climber.
customer_reviews.author: L. White

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific tree stand. I now have 2 of these. So comfortable and roomy.

customer_reviews.title: Great stand, never need another one...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it is everything I wanted and needed.... the reviews I read were spot on. It’s roomy and comfy I can’t wait to sit all day in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Tittle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put the stand together in about 10 minutes. Very easy to assembling. I can’t use it though. The platform support cables that came with it are 2 different lengths.
customer_reviews.author: George Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Best lock on stand I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable lock on stand I have ever hunted out of! Very high quality. Will be ordering multiple for my property.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to set up, and well worth the money spent. This is one of the best lockons I have ever purchased and will probably be purchasing another one in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made well.
customer_reviews.text: Stand has adjustable base for crocked trees. Made well but heavy to carry. Big stand and very comfortable was what i was looking for. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Kurpiel

customer_reviews.title: Best hang on stand on the market
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to setup. Very quiet stand. Doesn’t not make sounds like other stands when you’re moving around (even in cold temperatures). Durable good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: The Monster is the most comfortable tree stand ever offered to the public
customer_reviews.text: The Monster is the most comfortable tree stand ever offered to the public. When you are comfortable you can sit still, when you sit still you are quieter and a more effective hunter. Easy to hang ,huge, and worth every penny.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable lockon i have ever had. No more back ache, can sit for hours. Good purchase, well built

customer_reviews.title: Love this stand
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand. Only problem is it’s so comfortable that I fall asleep in it. I sit in it all day.

customer_reviews.text: Is the best biult and comfortable tree stand I have ever hunted from.

customer_reviews.text: Love the stand , easy to assemble, easy to hang.

customer_reviews.text: This tree stand is awesome. You can sit in the stand all day and still feel comfortable. I like the larger platform and foot rest that comes with the M150 Monster Hang-on.

customer_reviews.title: oh so nice just love it so nice to relax in and ...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I love these treestands
customer_reviews.text: I love these treestands. I am on 3 leases and we have 25-30 of these stands. Very comfortable for all day sit

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Lousy Quality
customer_reviews.text: This stand is an amazing product, but what showed up was less than acceptable. When you pay top dollar, you expect your purchase to arrive in good shape. When I opened the box I discovered a stand whose surface finish was scuffed and covered in micro dents. Other parts were worn and not seated properly. The thing just looked used ... really disappointed. The only thing stopping me from walking out on this deal is Amazon's replacement policy. A replacement is already on its way.
customer_reviews.author: Volusia Rider

customer_reviews.title: The self leveling feature does take some moving around of bolts so it can be done easily up in the air
customer_reviews.text: Feels so much safer than smaller Hang-On stands with the huge platform. Worth the extra money. The self leveling feature does take some moving around of bolts so it can be done easily up in the air.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Complete with harness and all necessary safety equipment.

customer_reviews.text: As described, took a long time to ship for what I paid.

customer_reviews.text: Stand is super light easy to set up and comfortable to sit I.

customer_reviews.text: This stad is secure, solid and extremely comfortable. A no brainer.

customer_reviews.title: Say good buy Big Game Stands
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable stand I have ever owned. Will buy another one for sure. Buy the cold weather seat pad. 1 stand will not do

customer_reviews.title: Almost to comfortable
customer_reviews.text: very nice stand , easy to hang. It is a little difficult to stand up and put the seat up and stay quiet , the seat is big so you have to use the end of the platform to be able to stand up. Might be to comfortable to bow hunt with I know that sounds crazy but when you've been sitting a while and get comfy and then a deer comes in its tough to take a sitting shot because of being sunken into the mess seat. Will be a perfect stand for gun hunting

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase my nephew used it this past Deer season ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase my nephew used it this past Deer season and said it was really comfortable and could stay in it all day. I also purchased a 110 Latter stand can't wait to get it up I know it will be a good one also. I am a firm believer in you get what you pay for.

customer_reviews.title: ended up going with a climber but thats just me.
customer_reviews.text: A little more work than I originally thought with this stand and a set of climbing sticks. Stand is everything that they say it is and then some, its just that I was hoping that setting up with this stand and climbing sticks would have been an easier ordeal. And yes I bout the good climbing sticks and obviously the good stand. I ended up selling this setup and going with a Lone Wolf sit n climb wide with summit replacement seat....awesome combo and less to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user for life!

customer_reviews.title: Get your drill and bits out
customer_reviews.text: Seams sturdy and comfortable but the holes didn’t match the bolt sizes. I had to drill out 3 of the holes. This stand was well over twice the price I’ve ever spent on a stand and I have never had to modify a stand before. It was the easiest stand to hang though. I would by another on but $206 is to much this is about $100 stand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered ahead of expected time, will use the stand this fall.

customer_reviews.title: Not as stable as it should be. Don't losen ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as stable as it should be. Don't losen to much when adjusting it. You'll be headed down the tree to get the knob.

customer_reviews.title: Once you have hunted from a Millennium Tree Stand you ...
customer_reviews.text: Once you have hunted from a Millennium Tree Stand you will not be able to go back to ordinary. So purchase this stand with caution and have a yard sale for your now inadequate equipment. This is the first of the last stand you will ever buy. I have six in 5 states. That's saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: Great stand , super comfortable, if it has one con it’s that there is no shooting rest and the one that’s available for it from millennium won’t support your rifle .
customer_reviews.author: archer3694

product_meta.title: Millennium Treestands Monster Hang-on Treestand
product_meta.description: The M150 Monster Hang-On tree stand is designed with, safety, comfort, stability, durability, and function to provide hunters with the best experience possible. If standard seat heights don’t fit you, the M150 Monster provides a solution: the ComfortMAX seat on this tree stand is adjustable from a height of 16 inches up to 20 inches off the platform, and it has a full backrest and side straps for solid comfort. The wide platform and fold-up seat give bowhunters maximum flexibility in positioning for a shot. The optional M101 shooting rail gives gun hunters a solid rest. This tree stand can be further adjusted so that it provides a level sit even on trees that lean as much as 15 degrees off vertical. Adjustable, flexible and built to last. The M150 Monster fits you and any style of hunting you like. Other features include the Safelink, large platform, quiet and easy setup, portable storage for backpacking, and it’s protected with a durable powder coat finish. The M150 Monster Tree Stand is built from durable aluminum and has a capacity of 300 pounds. Millennium Stands have long been recognized as the most comfortable stands on the market. From Texas to Alberta and South Carolina to Idaho, outfitters and guides know the best way to increase your chances of seeing a trophy animal is to sit in a prime location from sun up until sundown. Millennium stands are engineered for that purpose – to be the most comfortable and quietest stands period. Every angle, hinge, and weld has been tested under the most extreme conditions by the most cynical and scrutinizing hunters. Each Millennium option is the best compromise of weight, quietness, strength, security, and comfort for its intended use.
feature_bullets: A MORE COMFORTABLE WAY TO HUNT: Bagging that deer sometimes require spending hours up in the trees. The M150 Monster Hang-On tree stand is designed with comfort in mind featuring a comfortMAX height adjustable seat with a full backrest.

SAFELINK: Millennium is committed to hunter safety, which is why we designed SafeLink, a 35-foot rope with a Prusik knot and carabiner. Designed to aid in safely ascending and descending from hang-on and ladder stands.

LARGE PLATFORM: Having the room necessary to position yourself properly for that shot is important. So we made sure the seat folds up out of the way allowing plenty of room. Whether you're hunting with a rifle or bow, you’ll have plenty of space.

SMART CONSTRUCTION: The M150 is built from rugged aluminum and features a durable powder coat finish. It’s designed to be easy and quiet to set up. It can even be adjusted for trees that lean up to 15 degrees which expands your site options

MEASUREMENTS: Built to hold up to 300-pounds. The platform measures 24-inches wide and 37-inches deep. Seat size is 24-inches wide and 20-inches deep. The seat is adjustable from 16-inches above the platform to 20-inches.
